```json
{
  "summary": "This package provides extensions for mdast to parse and serialize MDX expressions (e.g., `{Math.PI}`). It allows processing MDX expressions within markdown documents by integrating with `mdast-util-from-markdown` and `mdast-util-to-markdown`.",
  "installation": {
    "npm": "npm install mdast-util-mdx-expression",
    "deno": "import {mdxExpressionFromMarkdown, mdxExpressionToMarkdown} from 'https://esm.sh/mdast-util-mdx-expression@2'",
    "browser": "<script type=\"module\">\n  import {mdxExpressionFromMarkdown, mdxExpressionToMarkdown} from 'https://esm.sh/mdast-util-mdx-expression@2?bundle'\n</script>"
  },
  "usage": "The example demonstrates how to use the package with `mdast-util-from-markdown` and `mdast-util-to-markdown` to parse and serialize a markdown file containing MDX expressions.",
  "api": [
    {
      "name": "mdxExpressionFromMarkdown()",
      "description": "Creates an extension for `mdast-util-from-markdown` to enable MDX expressions.  Requires `micromark-extension-mdx-expression` with `addResult: true` for ESTree representation.",
      "return": "FromMarkdownExtension"
    },
    {
      "name": "mdxExpressionToMarkdown()",
      "description": "Creates an extension for `mdast-util-to-markdown` to enable MDX expressions.",
      "return": "ToMarkdownExtension"
    },
    {
      "name": "MdxFlowExpression",
      "description": "Represents an MDX expression in flow content (block).",
      "type": "Literal with `data.estree` (ESTree Program)",
      "fields": ["type", "value", "data.estree"]
    },
    {
      "name": "MdxTextExpression",
      "description": "Represents an MDX expression in text content (inline).",
      "type": "Literal with `data.estree` (ESTree Program)",
      "fields": ["type", "value", "data.estree"]
    },
    {
      "name": "MdxFlowExpressionHast",
      "description": "Same as MdxFlowExpression, but with `hast` type registration.",

      "fields": ["type", "value", "data.estree"]
    },
```
